def longest_palindrome_substring(string):
    max_length = 1
    n = len(string)
    for i in range(n):
        left = i
        right = i
        while left >= 0 and right < n and (string[left] == string[right]):
            length = right - left + 1
            if length > max_length:
                max_length = length
            left -= 1
            right += 1
        left = i
        right = i + 1
        while left >= 0 and right < n and (string[left] == string[right]):
            length = right - left + 1
            if length > max_length:
                max_length = length
            left -= 1
            right += 1
    return max_length
